src:
Tim KPK Temukan Kendaraan Dinas Pemkot Prabumulih Dikuasai Pihak Ketiga
06 Nov 2019, 17:27 by Eko Sulestyono


Tim KPK Temukan Kendaraan Dinas Pemkot Prabumulih Dikuasai Pihak Ketiga

KBRN, Jakarta : Tim Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK)  menemukan sejumlah fakta bahwa ternyata masih ada sejumlah oknum mantan pejabat atau penyelenggara negara namun masih ingin “menguasai” aset milik negara. Menurut KPK sejumlah kendaraan dinas operasional itu masih dikuasai oleh pihak ketiga.
Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan di Jakarta menjelaskan bahwa ada temuan sejumlah Kemdaraan dinas milik negara yang masih dikuasai mantan pejabat di daerah, contohnya ditemukan di Kota Prabumulih, Sumatera Selatan (Sumsel).
"Ada  4 mobil dan 2 motor dengan status pinjam pakai oleh mantan pejabat di lingkungan Pemkot (Pemerintah Kota) Prabumulih namun hingga saat ini kendaraan tersebut belum dikembalikan kepada negara” kata Febri Diansyah di Jakarta , Rabu (6/11/2019).
Febri menjelaskan bahwa maksud kedatangan Tim KPK ke Prabumulih itu sebenarnya dalam melakukan rapat pertemuan sekaligus monitoring terkait evaluasi yang berlangsung sejak 4 hingga 5 November 2019. Menurut Febri, tim KPK juga menemukan adanya sejumlah aset milik pemerintah milik Pemkot Prabumulih yang belum bersertifikat.
"Terkait aset tanah, dilaporkan oleh Badan Pertanahan ada penambahan 9 sertifikat yang telah diterbitkan sehingga menjadi 158 dari total 278 aset berupa tanah di lingkungan Pemkot Prabumulih yang telah disertifikasi. Sisanya berjumlah 120 aset, dilaporkan sebanyak 34 aset sedang dalam proses sertifikasi sehingga menyisakan 86 aset tanah lainnya yang belum bersertifikat ," kata Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan di Jakarta. 
KPK mengharapkan agar aset-aset tersebut hendaknya segera ditertibkan agar tidak menimbulkan kerugian keuangan negara. KPK mendorong agar Pemkot Prabumulih mengoptimalisasi pendapatan asli daerah (PAD) dengan menggali potensi pajak daerah.
“Telah terpasang  sebanyak 40 tapping box sebagai alat pencatatan pajak online pada wajib pajak pelaku usaha pengelola hotel, restoran, tempat hiburan dan parkir. Penerapan pencatatan pajak online kepada para pelaku usaha khususnya pada tempat-tempat yang berpotensi penerimaan pajak” jelasnya . 
Diharapkan hal tersebut menjadi salah satu strategi meningkatkan PAD Pemkot Prabumulih. Selanjutnya kata Febri Diansyah juga telah diajukan kembali terkait pemasangan di 43 titik wajib pajak baru. 
Febri menjelaskan sejunlah kemdaraan milik negara yang masih dipakai mantan pejabat adalah 4 unit mobil, masing-masing satu unit Toyota Land Cruiser tahun 2009 dengan harga perolehan Rp 1.608.600.000, satu unit Mitsubishi Kuda GLX tahun 2002 dengan harga perolehan Rp 124.000.000. 
Selanjtnya satu unit Mobil Kijang KF 80 tahun 1997 dengan harga perolehan Rp 87.000.000 dan satu unit Nissan Terano tahun 2003 dengan harga perolehan Rp 225.000.000 ditambah 2 unit motor masing-maaing satu unit motor Yamaha tahun 2003 dan satu unit motor Yamaha Jupiter Z tahun 2005 dengan harga perolehan Rp 12.473.416.
text:
The KPK Team Finds the Vehicle of the City Government Office of Prabumulih Controlled by a Third Party
Nov 6 2019, 17:27 by Eko Sulestyono


The KPK Team Finds the Vehicle of the City Government Office of Prabumulih Controlled by a Third Party

KBRN, Jakarta: The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) Team found a number of facts that apparently there were still a number of former officials or state administrators but still wanted to "control" state-owned assets. According to the KPK a number of operational service vehicles are still controlled by third parties.
KPK Head of Public Relations, Febri Diansyah, told reporters in Jakarta that there were findings of a number of government-owned official government offices that were still controlled by former officials in the area, for example, they were found in Prabumulih City, South Sumatra (South Sumatra).
"There are 4 cars and 2 motorcycles with the status of borrow and use by former officials in the City Government (City Government) Prabumulih, but until now the vehicle has not been returned to the state," said Febri Diansyah in Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Febri explained that the purpose of the arrival of the KPK Team to Prabumulih was actually in conducting meetings as well as monitoring related to evaluations that took place from 4 to 5 November 2019. According to Febri, the KPK team also discovered that there were a number of government-owned assets belonging to the Prabumulih City Government that were not yet certified.
"Regarding land assets, it was reported by the Land Agency that there were 9 additional certificates issued so that 158 of the total 278 assets were land in the Prabumulih City Government that had been certified. The remaining 120 assets were reported, 34 assets were reportedly in the process of certification, leaving 86 assets other land that has not been certified, "Febri Diansyah told reporters in Jakarta.
The KPK hopes that these assets should be put in order immediately so as not to cause state financial losses. The KPK is pushing for the Prabumulih City Government to optimize the local revenue (PAD) by exploring the potential of local taxes.
"40 tapping boxes have been installed as an online tax recording tool for business taxpayers who manage hotels, restaurants, entertainment venues and parking. The application of online tax recording to business people, especially in places that have the potential to receive tax "he explained.
It is hoped that this will be one of the strategies to increase PAD in Prabumulih City Government. Furthermore, said Febri Diansyah also has been submitted again related to the installation in 43 points of the new taxpayer.
Febri explained that a number of state owned vehicles that were still used by former officials were 4 units of cars, each one unit of Toyota Land Cruiser in 2009 at an acquisition price of Rp 1,608,600,000, a unit of Mitsubishi Horse GLX in 2002 at an acquisition price of Rp 124,000,000.
Next one unit is Kijang KF 80 in 1997 with an acquisition price of Rp. 87,000,000 and a unit of Nissan Terano in 2003 with an acquisition price of Rp. 225,000,000 plus 2 units of motorbike, one unit of Yamaha motorbike in 2003 and one unit of Yamaha Jupiter Z motorbike. in 2005 with an acquisition price of Rp 12,473,416.
